thread.title: SLIDESHOW: Lucky's Market opens in Savannah
thread.title_full: SLIDESHOW: Lucky's Market opens in Savannah | savannahnow.com

author: Savannah Morning News
title: SLIDESHOW: Lucky's Market opens in Savannah
text:
Photos Back | Next Jennifer Menster/Savannah Morning News - Lucky's Market is now in Savannah. The natural foods grocer prides itself on the freshest produce and local products. The store opened on Abercorn Street Tuesday with an official grand opening scheduled for Wednesday morning. Back | Next Jennifer Menster/Savannah Morning News - Lucky's Market opened on Abercorn Street Tuesday with an official grand opening scheduled for Wednesday morning. By Savannah Morning News Lucky’s Market, a natural foods grocer that offers affordable options for every day foods and specialty choices, is now open in Savannah.
The grocer will hold a grand-opening for it’s first Savannah location Wednesday with a bacon-cutting.
The Colorado-based grocer aims to sell the cheapest produce in town while also offering a wide selection of natural, organic and gluten-free items.
View a slideshow here for a sneak peek look at Lucky's.
Be sure to pick up Wednesday's Savannah Morning News or visit businessinsavannah.com for more on this story.
